name: Carrom Live!
description:
Carrom Live! is a multiplayer game that you play with friends or people around the world!

-------------------------------

From the makers of the smash hit Teen Patti comes Carrom Live! an immersive multiplayer Carrom game. Keep beating opponents to earn XP and Chips. Try hitting some whacky shots to unlock achievements and be rewarded. Level up! by dominating your opponents or just choose to enjoy a quick game of carrom when you're headed to work or school!

-------------------------------

* Featuring two amazing game modes– Freestyle and Black & White

* Real time multiplayer gameplay

* Play with your friends via Facebook or just hit the play button and let us find an opponent to battle it out with

* Try your hand at unlocking all the achievements and level up!

* Multiple camera angles to choose from

* Compete for the #1 spot on the Leaderboard

* Intuitive controls

* Chat with oppponent player
